lines: Gods' sake, womanman, you're disrupting my research! I was in the midst of measuring the flow of aether, but you've gone and made me raise my voice! Now I can't feel a godsdamned thing! Bah, I say! Bah!
Again you disrupt my research─and for what!? You have your crystal. What more do you need?
Whatever it is, I do not care. I, Hahasako, greatest of Professor Lamberteint's pupils, can suffer no further distractions! Away with you!
Ah, the honorary student. Have you any new findings?
None at all, eh? Well, never fear─my thesis will make up for your lack of progress, and prove I am the greatest of the professor's students!
